item.title: Keys to Success
item.description: Empathy Optimism Embrace ambiguity Make it Learn from failure Iterate, Iterate Creative Confidence

item.title: Managing Stakeholders
item.description: Communicate Consult early and often Remember - ‘they are human’ Plan it Relationships Show your care Manage risks Compromise Understand - what is success Take responsibilities
